overview:
Colin is a web developer and internet marketer by trade, but also does a great deal of work in education, developing online and distance learning for further and higher education.

Colin works as a web developer/designer for numerous clients along with a number of his own web apps and ecommerce sites. He also works a great deal in Internet Marketing and Search Engine Optimisation, both for clients and in promoting his own projects.

In terms of elearning, Colin has worked for colleges and universities in creating online learning modules and courses. He has a background in pedagogical approaches for online learning and experience in implementing various web2.0 tools in facilitating student support and development.
